# post-collapsible



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                             | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `collapsed`    | `collapsed`     | If `true`, the element is initially collapsed otherwise it is displayed.                | `boolean` | `false` |
| `headingLevel` | `heading-level` | Defines the hierarchical level of the collapsible header within the headings structure. | `number`  | `2`     |


## Methods

### `toggle(open?: boolean) => Promise<boolean>`

Triggers the collapse programmatically.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<boolean>`
